p: Between April 14, 2020 and June 9, 2020, a total of 272 donors enrolled the NorthShore University Health System convalescent plasma collection study. Median donor age was 47.8 years (range 19 to 77); 130 (47.8%) of the donors were male and 142 (52.2%) were female. The median time from symptom resolution to the initial NP swab test was 36.3 days (maximum 79 days), see Table 1.
